title: Class 3-C Has A Secret - Novel Updates
author: charotera101
description:
Teacher Yuko,
There is something wrong with this class.
I don’t know it yet.
After your death
Killing became a common thing
And I’m going to find that out.
You may think that…
We’re just a bunch of annoying kids
In this class, there are 3 murderers
Who might it be?
Is it the bullies?
Or is it the one who’s getting bullied?
Or is it the one of the girls?
I don’t belong here
but it turns out that they are all monsters
An unexpected love
And the most painful truth>
